Headline: #6 Jackson Park Express Temporary Reroute at 47th/Lake Park
ShortDescription: 6 Jackson Park Express buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via Stony Island, 57th and Lake Shore Drive due to street blockage near 47th/Lake Park.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
How does this affect my trip?

#6 Jackson Park Express buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via Stony Island, 57th and Lake Shore Drive due to street blockage near 47th/Lake Park.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #47 47th Temporary Reroute near 47th/Lake Park
ShortDescription: 47 47th buses temp. rerouted Eastbound via 47th, Woodlawn, 48th, Drexel & 47th; Westbound via (continue) 47th & Drexel due to street blockage at 47th/Lake Park.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
How does this affect my trip?

#47 47th buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions, due to street blockage at 47th/Lake Park.

  • Eastbound buses will operate via 47th, Woodlawn, 48th, Drexel and 47th.
  • Westbound  buses will operate via (continue) 47th and Drexel.

Allow extra travel time.
